Text:
for those of you who wanting to know the updates on the next "Megapack" i'm preparing one now and i'm estimating it will be 50gb bigger. Once i start seeding that one i will stop seeding the 2010.  Plz continue to seed the 2010 until then. The 2012 Edition should contain all of 2010 so if your downloading it now you'll be already ahead on downloading the next.

Thanks for the seeding and let me know if there are any questions.
